worldback_machine.options.general.cloud_:
The cloud storage provider that will be used when managing world backups.

The options available are those that come with the mod and ones registered by other mods.

The available options are:
worldback_machine.options.backups.are_au: If enabled, the mod is allowed to automatically create and upload backups of the world on a configurable interval.
worldback_machine.options.backups.backup: How often the mod will create and upload backups of the world.
